sentences.english: China will defend its territorial integrity from old thieves .
sentences.chinese: 中國將從這些慣偷手裏維護自己的領土完整。

sentences.english: The attitude of the professional thief is quite different.
sentences.chinese: 慣偷的態度則迥然不同。

sentences.english: The old thief had a criminal record a mile long.
sentences.chinese: 這個慣偷的犯罪記錄有一里地長。

sentences.english: Iron fetters are fastened on the legs of murderers and inveterate burglars.
sentences.chinese: 對殺人犯和慣偷慣盜，則使用鐵質腳鐐。
